name: High Protein Pepperoni Pizza Calzones
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F or preheat air fryer to 375°F
In a large bowl, combine the flour, Greek yogurt, and salt; mix until clumps form
Knead the mixture by hand until a smooth dough ball forms
Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface and roll out evenly
Slice the dough into 6 equal portions
Flatten each portion into a circular disc
Spoon pizza sauce onto the center of each disc
Top with shredded cheese and pepperoni
Fold the dough over to form calzones and seal the edges
Lightly spray the tops with cooking spray and sprinkle with parsley
Bake for 12–15 minutes until golden brown, or air fry for 8–10 minutes until crisp
